definition: shaking and vibration at the surface of the earth resulting from underground movement along a fault plane of from volcanic activity, to shake with seismic vibrations
details:
noun
- shaking and vibration at the surface of the earth resulting from underground movement along a fault plane of from volcanic activity
= example: shaking and vibration at the surface of the earth resulting from underground movement along a fault plane of from volcanic activity
= synonyms: earthquake
verb
- to shake with seismic vibrations
= example: to shake with seismic vibrations
= synonyms: tremor
- to shake with fast, tremulous movements
= example: to shake with fast, tremulous movements
= synonyms: quiver
